---
title: Release notes
---


This page includes the list of changes made to Catalog APIs for each release.

## OData Catalog API updates

### OData API single product response update [2023-10-02]

To comply with the OData PRIP interfaces, the **OData API** response for a single product query was updated. The response returns the product itself instead of a list containing the product (assigned to the field `value`). The example reflecting the change is presented below:

::: {.panel-tabset}

# OData API request example

[`https://datahub.creodias.eu/odata/v1/Products(f5439b10-deb4-420e-9b84-146035fbb16c)`](<https://datahub.creodias.eu/odata/v1/Products(f5439b10-deb4-420e-9b84-146035fbb16c)>){target="_blank"}

:::

#### OData API response change

::: {.panel-tabset}

## STAC Catalog API updates

### STAC API interface update [2023-10-09]

To comply with the with the STAC item specification the STAC API interface was updated. The `beginningDateTime` and `endingDateTime` attributes were replaced by `start_datetime` and `end_datetime`.

::: {.panel-tabset}

# STAC Request Example

[`https://datahub.creodias.eu/stac/collections/SENTINEL-3/items?`](<https://datahub.creodias.eu/stac/collections/SENTINEL-3/items?>){target="_blank"}

:::

#### STAC API response change

::: {.panel-tabset}

# New response
